product.name: 1. APPLE
product.description: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree. Apple trees are cultivated worldwide and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus!!

product.name: 2. ORANGE
product.description: The orange is the fruit of various citrus species in the family Rutaceae; it primarily refers to Citrus Ã— sinensis, which is also called sweet orange!!

product.name: 3. GRAPES
product.description: A grape is a fruit, botanically a berry, of the deciduous woody vines of the flowering plant genus Vitis!!

product.name: 4. PAPAYA
product.description: The papaya, papaw, or pawpaw is the plant Carica papaya, one of the 22 accepted species in the genus Carica of the family Caricaceae!!

product.name: 5. WATER MELON
product.description: Watermelon is a plant species in the family Cucurbitaceae, a vine-like flowering plant originally domesticated in Africa!!

product.name: 6. PINEAPPLE
product.description: The pineapple is a tropical plant with an edible fruit and the most economically significant plant in the family Bromeliaceae!!

product.name: 7. TOMATO
product.description: The tomato is the edible, often red berry of the plant Solanum lycopersicum, commonly known as a tomato plant.

product.name: 8. POTATO
product.description: The potato is a root vegetable native to the Americas, a starchy tuber of the plant Solanum tuberosum, and the plant itself is a perennial in the nightshade family, Solanaceae!!

product.name: 9. RADISH
product.description: The radish belongs to the Cruciferae family and its scientific name is Raphanus sativus L!!

product.name: 10. LADIES FINGER
product.description: Okra or Okro, Abelmoschus esculentus, known in many English-speaking countries as ladies' fingers or ochro, is a flowering plant in the mallow family!!

product.name: 11. MANGO
product.description: A mango is a stone fruit produced from numerous species of tropical trees belonging to the flowering plant genus Mangifera, cultivated mostly for their edible fruit!!

product.name: 12. PUMPKIN
product.description: A pumpkin is a cultivar of winter squash that is round with smooth, slightly ribbed skin, and is most often deep yellow to orange in coloration. The thick shell contains the seeds and pulp.
